description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing organization and location state within a frontend application. It includes type definitions for `Organization` and `Location`, and provides state management functions such as setting organizations and locations, and switching the current organization or location.

methods.name: setOrganizations
methods.description: Updates the list of organizations and sets the current organization ID to the first item's ID if available.

methods.name: setLocations
methods.description: Updates the list of locations and sets the current location ID to the first item's ID if available.

methods.name: switchOrg
methods.description: Sets the current organization ID to the specified ID.

methods.name: switchLocation
methods.description: Sets the current location ID to the specified ID.

ctags.name: Location
ctags.pattern: /^export type Location = { id: string; name: string };$/

ctags.name: Organization
ctags.pattern: /^export type Organization = { id: string; name: string; logoUrl?: string | null };$/
